Iron Man Wikipedia Iron Man From Wikipedia free encyclopedia Jump navigation Jump search This article about fictional superhero other uses see Iron Man disambiguation Tony Stark redirects here film character see Tony Stark Marvel Cinematic Universe Superhero appearing in Marvel Comics publications Iron Man Iron Man in Invincible Iron Man June Art by Salvador Larroca Publication information Publisher Marvel Comics First appearance Tales Suspense March Created by Stan Lee Larry Lieber Don Heck Jack Kirby In story information Alter ego Anthony Edward Tony Stark Place origin Long Island New York Team affiliations Avengers Department Defense Force Works New Avengers Guardians Galaxy Illuminati Mighty Avengers S H E L D Stark Industries Stark Resilient Thunderbolts Partnerships War Machine Rescue Ironheart Spider Man Captain America Abilities Genius level intellect Proficient scientist engineer Powered armor suit Superhuman strength durability Supersonic flight Energy repulsor missile projection Regenerative life support Iron Man fictional superhero appearing in American comic books published by Marvel Comics character was co created by writer editor Stan Lee developed by scripter Larry Lieber designed by artists Don Heck Jack Kirby character made his first appearance in Tales Suspense cover dated March received his own title in Iron Man May wealthy American business magnate playboy ingenious scientist Anthony Edward Tony Stark suffers severe chest injury during kidnapping his captors attempt force him build weapon mass destruction he instead creates mechanized suit armor save his life escape captivity Later Stark develops his suit adding weapons other technological devices he designed through his company Stark Industries He uses suit successive versions protect world as Iron Man Although at first concealing his true identity Stark eventually declared that he was in fact Iron Man in public announcement Initially Iron Man was vehicle Stan Lee explore Cold War themes particularly role American technology industry in fight against communism Subsequent re imaginings Iron Man have transitioned from Cold War motifs contemporary matters time Throughout most character s publication history Iron Man has been founding member superhero team Avengers has been featured in several incarnations his own various comic book series Iron Man has been adapted several animated TV shows films Marvel Cinematic Universe character was portrayed by Robert Downey Jr in Marvel Cinematic Universe films Iron Man Incredible Hulk in cameo Iron Man Avengers Iron Man Avengers Age Ultron Captain America Civil War Spider Man Homecoming Avengers Infinity War Avengers Endgame will reprise his role in Black Widow Iron Man was ranked th on IGN s Top Comic Book Heroes in third in list Top Avengers in Contents Publication history Premiere Themes Solo series Fictional character biography Origins s early s Late s s s Civil War Secret Invasion Dark Reign s Siege Heroic Age Fear Itself Return Mandarin Marvel NOW Superior Iron Man Time Runs Out All New All Different Marvel Marvel NOW Existing as an Marvel Legacy Powers abilities equipment Armor Powers Skills Supporting characters Other versions In other media Cultural influence legacy See also References Further reading External links Publication history Further information List Iron Man titles Premiere Iron Man s Marvel Comics premiere in Tales Suspense cover dated March was collaboration among editor story plotter Stan Lee scripter Larry Lieber story artist Don Heck cover artist character designer Jack Kirby In Lee had been toying with idea businessman superhero He wanted create quintessential capitalist character that would go against spirit times Marvel s readership Lee said think gave myself dare It was height Cold War readers young readers if was one thing they hated it was war it was military So got hero represented that hundredth degree He was weapons manufacturer he was providing weapons Army he was rich he was an industrialist thought it would be fun take kind character that nobody would like none our readers would like shove him down throats make them like him he became very popular He set out make new character wealthy glamorous ladies man but one with secret that would plague torment him as well Writer Gerry Conway said Here have this character on outside invulnerable mean just can t be touched but inside wounded figure Stan made it very much an in face wound know his heart was broken know literally broken But s metaphor going on that s think made that character interesting Lee based this playboy s looks personality on Howard Hughes explaining Howard Hughes was one most colorful men our time He was an inventor an adventurer multi billionaire ladies man finally nutcase Without being crazy he was Howard Hughes Lee said While Lee intended write story himself minor deadline emergency eventually forced him hand over premiere issue Lieber fleshed out story art was split between Kirby Heck He designed costume Heck said Kirby he was doing cover covers were always done first But created look characters like Tony Stark his secretary Pepper Potts In interview asked if he had specific model Tony Stark other characters Heck replied No would be thinking more along lines some characters like which would be same kind characters that Alex Toth liked which was an Errol Flynn type Iron Man first appeared in page stories in Tales Suspense which featured anthology science fiction supernatural stories character s original costume was bulky gray armored suit replaced by golden version in second story issue April It was redesigned as sleeker red golden armor in issue Dec by that issue s interior artist Steve Ditko although Kirby drew it on cover As Heck recalled in T he second costume red yellow one was designed by Steve Ditko found it easier than drawing that bulky old thing earlier design robot looking one was more Kirbyish In his premiere Iron Man was an anti communist hero defeating various Vietnamese agents Lee later regretted this early focus Throughout character s comic book series technological advancement national defense were constant themes Iron Man but later issues developed Stark into more complex vulnerable character as they depicted his battle with alcoholism as in Demon in Bottle storyline other personal difficulties From issue Nov its final issue March anthological science fiction backup stories in Tales Suspense were replaced by feature starring superhero Captain America Lee Heck introduced several adversaries character including Mandarin in issue Feb Black Widow in April Hawkeye five issues later Lee said that all comic books we published at Marvel we got more fan mail Iron Man from women from females than any other title We didn t get much fan mail from girls but whenever we did letter was usually addressed Iron Man Lee Kirby included Iron Man in Avengers Sept as founding member superhero team character has since appeared in every subsequent volume series Writers have updated war locale in which Stark injured In original story it was Vietnam War In s it was updated be first Gulf War in s updated again be war in Afghanistan Stark s time with Asian Nobel Prize winning scientist Ho Yinsen consistent through nearly all incarnations Iron Man origin depicting Stark Yinsen building original armor together One exception direct DVD animated feature film Invincible Iron Man in which armor Stark uses escape his captors not first Iron Man suit Themes original Iron Man title explored Cold War themes as did other Stan Lee projects in early years Marvel Comics Fantastic Four Incredible Hulk respectively focused on American domestic government responses Communist threat Iron Man explored industry s role in struggle Tony Stark s real life model Howard Hughes was significant defense contractor developed new weapons technologies Hughes was an icon both American individualism burdens fame Historian Robert Genter in Journal Popular Culture writes that Tony Stark specifically presents an idealized portrait American inventor earlier decades had seen important technological innovations come from famous individuals e g Nikola Tesla Thomas Edison Alexander Graham Bell Wright brothers s saw new technologies including weapons being developed mainly by research teams corporations As result little room remained inventor wanted credit creative economic control over his her own creations Issues entrepreneurial autonomy government supervision research ultimate loyalty figured prominently in early Iron Man stories same issues affecting American scientists engineers that era Tony Stark writes Genter an inventor finds motive in his emasculation as an autonomous creative individual This blow symbolized by his chest wound inflicted at moment he forced invent things purposes others instead just himself Genter Stark s transformation into Iron Man represents Stark s effort reclaim his autonomy thus his manhood character s pursuit women in bed in battle writes Genter represents another aspect this effort pattern finds parallels in other works s popular fiction by authors such as Ian Fleming creator James Bond Mickey Spillane Mike Hammer Norman Mailer made unregulated sexuality form authenticity Solo series After issue March Tales Suspense series was renamed Captain America An Iron Man story appeared in one shot comic Iron Man Sub Mariner April before Golden Avenger made his solo debut with Iron Man May series indicia gives its copyright title Iron Man while trademarked cover logo most issues Invincible Iron Man This initial series ended with issue Sept Jim Lee Scott Lobdell Jeph Loeb authored second volume series which was drawn primarily by Whilce Portacio Ryan Benjamin This volume took place in parallel universe ran issues Nov Nov Volume whose first issues were written by Kurt Busiek then by Busiek Roger Stern ran issues Feb Dec Later writers included Joe Quesada Frank Tieri Mike Grell John Jackson Miller Issue June was additionally numbered reflecting start dual numbering starting from premiere issue volume one in final issue was dual numbered as next Iron Man series Iron Man vol debuted in early with Warren Ellis written storyline Extremis with artist Adi Granov It ran issues Jan Jan with cover logo simply Iron Man beginning with issue Iron Man Director S H E L D beginning issue On final three issues cover logo was overwritten by War Machine Weapon S H E L D which led launch War Machine ongoing series Invincible Iron Man vol by writer Matt Fraction artist Salvador Larroca began with premiere issue cover dated July seven month overlap Marvel published both volume four volume five simultaneously This Invincible volume jumped its numbering issues from cover dated March reflect start from premiere issue volume one in After conclusion Invincible Iron Man new Iron Man series was started as part Marvel Now Written by Kieron Gillen illustrated by Greg Land it began with issue in November Many Iron Man annuals miniseries one shot titles have been published through years such as Age Innocence Rebirth Iron Man Feb Iron Man Iron Age Aug Sept Iron Man Bad Blood Sept Dec Iron Man House M Sept Nov Fantastic Four Iron Man Big in Japan Dec March Iron Man Inevitable Feb July Iron Man Captain America Casualties War Feb Iron Man Hypervelocity March Aug Iron Man Enter Mandarin Nov April Iron Man Legacy Doom June Sept Publications have included such spin offs as one shot Iron Man June featuring different Iron Man in future animated TV series adaptations Marvel Action Hour Featuring Iron Man Nov June Marvel Adventures Iron Man July June Fictional character biography This article s plot summary may be long excessively detailed Please help improve it by removing unnecessary details making it more concise July Learn remove this template message Tales Suspense March Iron Man debuts Cover art by Jack Kirby Don Heck Tales Suspense Dec debut Iron Man s first red gold suit armor Cover art by Jack Kirby Sol Brodsky Origins Anthony Edward Stark son wealthy industrialist head Stark Industries Howard Stark Maria Stark boy genius he enters MIT at age study engineering later receives master s degrees in engineering physics After his parents are killed in car accident he inherits his father s company Stark injured by booby trap captured by enemy forces led by Wong Chu Wong Chu orders Stark build weapons but Stark s injuries are dire shrapnel moving towards his heart His fellow prisoner Ho Yinsen Nobel Prize winning physicist whose work Stark had greatly admired during college constructs magnetic chest plate keep shrapnel from reaching Stark s heart In secret Stark Yinsen use workshop design construct suit powered armor which Stark uses escape During escape attempt Yinsen sacrifices his life save Stark s by distracting enemy as Stark recharges Stark takes revenge on his kidnappers rejoins American forces on his way meeting wounded American Marine fighter pilot James Rhodey Rhodes Back home Stark discovers that shrapnel fragment lodged in his chest cannot be removed without killing him he forced wear armor s chestplate beneath his clothes act as regulator his heart He must recharge chestplate every day else risk shrapnel killing him cover story that Stark tells news media general public that Iron Man his robotic personal bodyguard corporate mascot that end Iron Man fights threats his company e g Communist opponents Black Widow Crimson Dynamo Titanium Man as well as independent villains like Mandarin becomes his greatest enemy No one suspects Stark being Iron Man as he cultivates strong public image being rich playboy industrialist Two notable members series supporting cast at this point are his personal chauffeur Harold Happy Hogan secretary Virginia Pepper Potts both whom he eventually reveals his dual identity Meanwhile James Rhodes finds his own niche as Stark s personal pilot ultimately revealing himself be man extraordinary skill daring in his own right series took an anti Communist stance in its early years which was softened as public therefore presumably reader opposition rose Vietnam War This change evolved in series storylines featuring Stark reconsidering his political opinions morality manufacturing weapons U S military Stark shows himself be occasionally arrogant willing act unethically in order let ends justify means This leads personal conflicts with people around him both in his civilian superhero identities Stark uses his vast personal fortune not only outfit his own armor but also develop weapons S H E L D other technologies e g Quinjets used by Avengers image inducers used by X Men Eventually Stark s heart condition resolved with an artificial heart transplant s early s Stark expands on his armor designs begins build his arsenal specialized armors particular situations such as space travel stealth Stark also develops serious dependency on alcohol in Demon in Bottle storyline first time it becomes problem Stark discovers that national security agency S H E L D has been buying controlling interest in his company in order ensure Stark s continued weapons development them At same time it revealed that several minor supervillains armed with advanced weapons had bedeviled Stark throughout his superhero career are in fact in employ Stark s business rival Justin Hammer begins plague Stark more directly At one point in Hammer s manipulations Iron Man armor taken over used murder diplomat Although Iron Man not immediately under suspicion Stark forced hand armor over authorities Eventually Stark Rhodes now his personal pilot confidant track down defeat those responsible although Hammer would return bedevil Stark again With support his then girlfriend Bethany Cabe his friends his employees Stark pulls through these crises overcomes his dependency on alcohol Even as he recovers from this harrowing personal trial Stark s life further complicated he has confrontation with Doctor Doom that interrupted by an opportunistic enemy sending them back in time time King Arthur Once Iron Man thwarts Doom s attempt solicit aid Morgan Le Fay Latverian ruler swears deadly vengeance be indulged sometime after two return own time This incident was collected published as Doomquest Some time later ruthless rival Obadiah Stane manipulates Stark emotionally into serious relapse As result Stark loses control Stark International Stane becomes homeless alcoholic vagrant gives up his armored identity Rhodes becomes new Iron Man Eventually Stark recovers joins new startup Circuits Maximus Stark concentrates on new technological designs including building new set armor as part his recuperative therapy Rhodes continues act as Iron Man but steadily grows more aggressive paranoid due armor not having been calibrated properly his use Eventually Rhodes goes on rampage Stark has don replica his original armor stop him Fully recovered Stark confronts Stane has himself designed armor based on designs seized along with Stark International dubbing himself Iron Monger Defeated in battle Stane rather than give Stark satisfaction taking him trial commits suicide Shortly thereafter Stark regains his personal fortune but decides against repurchasing Stark International until much later he instead creates Stark Enterprises headquartered in Los Angeles Late s s In an attempt stop other people from misusing his designs Stark goes about disabling other armored heroes villains are using suits based on Iron Man technology designs which were stolen by his enemy Spymaster His quest destroy stolen technology originally called Stark Wars but more commonly known as Armor Wars severely hurts his reputation as Iron Man After attacking disabling series minor villains such as Stilt Man he attacks defeats government operative known as Stingray situation worsens Stark realizes that Stingray s armor does not incorporate any his designs He publicly fires Iron Man while covertly pursuing his agenda He uses cover story wanting help disable rogue Iron Man infiltrate disable armor S H E L D operatives known as Mandroids as well as armor Guardsmen In process Iron Man Jim Rhodes allow some villains in Vault escape This leads United States government declare Iron Man danger an outlaw severely sours Stark s relationship with Steve Rogers Captain America was in his Captain persona at time Iron Man travels Russia he inadvertently causes death Soviet Titanium Man during fight Returning U S he faces an enemy commissioned by government named Firepower Unable defeat him head on Stark fakes Iron Man s demise intending retire suit permanently Firepower goes rogue Stark creates new suit claiming new person in armor Soon after Stark nearly killed by Kathy Dare mentally unbalanced former lover She shoots him dead center in his torso which injures his spine paralyzing him Stark undergoes special surgery have nerve chip implanted into his spine regain his mobility Unbeknownst industrialist nerve chip clandestine means by which gain control over his body Rival businessmen Marrs Twins cohort Kearson DeWitt are behind machinations in came be known as Armor Wars II After several successful tests by DeWitt at manipulating Stark Tony finds that using his Encephalo Armor can counteract DeWitt s controls In response DeWitt suddenly releases his control resulting in excruciating agony throughout Stark s body constant battle control Stark s nervous system subsequent abdication on DeWitt s end lead massive nerve damage throughout Tony s body Stark s nervous system continues its slide towards failure he constructs skin made up artificial nerve circuitry assist it Stark begins pilot remote controlled Iron Man armor but faced with Masters Silence telepresence suit proves inadequate Stark designs more heavily armed version suit wear Variable Threat Response Battle Suit which becomes known as War Machine armor Ultimately damage his nervous system becomes extensive Faking his death Stark places himself in suspended animation heal as Rhodes takes over both running Stark Enterprises mantle Iron Man although he uses War Machine armor Stark eventually makes full recovery by using chip create an entirely new artificial nervous system resumes as Iron Man in new Telepresence Armor Rhodes learns that Stark has manipulated his friends by faking his own death he becomes enraged two friends part ways Rhodes continues on as War Machine in solo career Avengers story arc Crossing reveals Iron Man as traitor among team s ranks due years manipulation by time traveling dictator Kang Conqueror Stark as sleeper agent in Kang s thrall kills Marilla nanny Crystal Quicksilver s daughter Luna as well as Rita DeMara female Yellowjacket then Amanda Chaney an ally Avengers Avengers Forever limited series retcons these events as work disguised Immortus not Kang that mental control had gone back only few months Needing help defeat both Stark Kang team travels back in time recruit teenaged Anthony Stark from an alternate timeline assist them young Stark steals an Iron Man suit in order aid Avengers against his older self sight his younger self shocks older Stark enough him regain momentary control his actions he sacrifices his life stop Kang young Stark later builds his own suit become new Iron Man remains in present day During battle with creature called Onslaught teenage Stark dies along with many other superheroes Franklin Richards preserves these dead heroes in Heroes Reborn pocket universe in which Stark once again an adult hero Franklin recreates heroes in pocket universe in forms he most familiar with rather than they are at present reborn adult Stark upon returning normal Marvel Universe merges with original Stark had died during Crossing but was resurrected by Franklin Richards This new Anthony Stark possesses memories both original teenage Anthony Stark thus considers himself be essentially both them With aid law firm Nelson Murdock he regains his fortune with Stark Enterprises having been sold Fujikawa Corporation following Stark s death sets up new company Stark Solutions He returns from pocket universe with restored healthy heart After Avengers reform Stark demands hearing be convened look into his actions just prior Onslaught incident Cleared wrongdoing he rejoins Avengers s At one point Stark s armor becomes sentient despite fail safes prevent its increasingly sophisticated computer systems from doing so Initially Stark welcomes this living armor its improved tactical abilities armor begins grow more aggressive killing indiscriminately eventually desiring replace Stark altogether In final confrontation on desert island Stark suffers another heart attack armor sacrifices its own existence save its creator s life giving up essential components give Stark new artificial heart This new heart solves Stark s health problems but it does not have an internal power supply so Stark becomes once again dependent on periodic recharging sentient armor incident so disturbs Stark that he temporarily returns using an unsophisticated early model version his armor avoid repeat incident He dabbles with using liquid metal circuitry known as S K N that forms into protective shell around his body but eventually returns more conventional hard metal armors During this time Stark engages in romance with Rumiko Fujikawa wealthy heiress daughter man had taken over his company during Heroes Reborn period Her relationship with Stark endures many highs lows including infidelity with Stark s rival Tiberius Stone in part fun loving Rumiko believes that Stark serious dull relationship ends with Rumiko s death at hands an Iron Man impostor in Iron Man vol In Iron Man vol July Stark publicly reveals his dual identity as Iron Man not realizing that by doing so he has invalidated agreements protecting his armor from government duplication since those contracts state that Iron Man armor would be used by an employee Tony Stark not by Stark himself he discovers that United States military again using his technology its defective nature nearly causes disaster in Washington D C which Iron Man barely manages avert Stark accepts Presidential appointment as Secretary Defense In this way he hopes monitor direct his designs are used In Avengers Disassembled storyline Stark forced resign after launching into tirade against Latverian ambassador at United Nations being manipulated by mentally imbalanced Scarlet Witch destroys Avengers Mansion kills several members Stark publicly stands down as Iron Man but continues using costume He joins Avengers in stopping breakout in progress from Raft even saves Captain America from falling Tony changes Avengers base Stark Tower Ghost Living Laser Spymaster reappear shift Iron Man from standard superhero stories dealing with politics industrialism New Avengers Illuminati June reveals that years before Stark had participated with secret group that included Black Panther Professor X Mister Fantastic Black Bolt Doctor Strange Namor goal group dubbed Illuminati by Marvel was strategize overarching menaces in which Black Panther rejects membership offer Stark s goal create governing body all superheroes in world but beliefs its members instead force them all share vital information Civil War In Civil War storyline after actions inexperienced superheroes New Warriors result in destruction several city blocks in Stamford Connecticut an outcry across America against superhumans Learning Government s proposed plans Tony Stark suggests new plan instigate Superhuman Registration Act Act would force every superpowered individual in U S register identity with government act as licensed agents Act would force inexperienced superhumans receive training in use control abilities something in which Tony strongly believes Since his struggle with alcoholism Stark has carried tremendous burden guilt after nearly killing an innocent bystander while piloting armor drunk While Reed Richards Dr Henry Hank Pym both agree with Stark s proposal not everyone does After Captain America ordered bring in anyone refuses register he other anti registration superheroes go rogue coming into conflict with pro registration heroes led by Iron Man war ends Captain America surrenders prevent further collateral damage civilian casualties although he had defeated Stark by defusing his armor Stark appointed new director S H E L D organizes new government sanctioned group Avengers Shortly afterwards Captain America assassinated while in custody This leaves Stark with great amount guilt misgivings about cost his victory Secret Invasion tie into Iron Man feature film Marvel launched new Iron Man ongoing series Invincible Iron Man with writer Matt Fraction artist Salvador Larroca series inaugural six part storyline was Five Nightmares which saw Stark targeted by Ezekiel Stane son Stark s former nemesis Obadiah Stane In Secret Invasion storyline after Tony Stark survives an attempt by Ultron take over his body he confronted in hospital by Spider Woman holding corpse Skrull posing as Elektra Realizing this start an invasion by Skrulls Tony reveals corpse Illuminati declares that they are at war After Black Bolt reveals himself as Skrull killed by Namor squadron Skrulls attack forcing Tony evacuate other Illuminati members destroy area killing all Skrulls Realizing that they are incapable trusting each other members all separate form individual plans oncoming invasion Stark discredited publicly vilified after his inability anticipate prevent secret infiltration invasion Earth by Skrulls by Skrull disabling his StarkTech technology which had virtual monopoly on worldwide defense After invasion U S government removes him as head S H E L D disbands Avengers handing control Initiative over Norman Osborn Dark Reign Main article Dark Reign comics See also Invincible Iron Man With his Extremis powers failing Stark uploads virus destroy all records Registration Act thus preventing Osborn from learning identities his fellow heroes anything that Osborn could use including his repulsor generators only copy database in Stark s brain which he tries delete while on run from Osborn Stark goes so far as inflict brain damage on himself in order ensure that relevant information wiped Osborn catches up debilitated Stark beats him savagely Pepper Potts broadcasts beatings worldwide costing Osborn credibility giving Stark public sympathy Stark goes into vegetative state having previously granted Donald Blake alter ego superhero Thor power attorney holographic message stored in Pepper s armor reveals that Stark had developed means rebooting his mind from his current state prior his destruction database with Blake Bucky resolving use it restore him normal Meanwhile Stark trapped in his subconscious figments his own mind prevent him from returning waking world procedure fails work Bucky calls in Doctor Strange succeeds in restoring Stark back consciousness backup Stark created was made prior Civil War as such he does not remember anything that took place during event although he still concludes after reviewing his past actions that he would not have done anything differently His brain damage means he now dependent on an arc reactor sustain his body s autonomous functions s Siege Main article Siege comics In Siege storyline Tony Stark seen under care Dr Donald Blake Maria Hill Asgard attacked Thor ambushed by Osborn Sentry but rescued by Hill Osborn declares martial law unleashes Daken Sentry on Broxton root out Thor Hill Hill returns Stark s hiding place move him safer location are joined by Speed Young Avengers has set Iron Man s MK III armor that Edwin Jarvis had given Captain America While Osborn battling New Avengers Stark appears disables Osborn s Iron Patriot armor Osborn orders Sentry annihilate Asgard rather than allow Avengers have it After Asgard falls Stark stands alongside his fellow heroes as Osborn exclaims they are all doomed he was saving them from him pointing up towards Void possessed Sentry As Void tears apart teams Loki gives them power fight back through Norn Stones Void kills Loki enraging Thor Tony tells Thor get Void away from Asgard which allows Tony drop commandeered H M M E R Helicarrier on Void Thor forced killed Sentry Void resurfaces Sometime later Super Human Registration Act repealed Tony given back his company armor As symbol heroics new unity Thor places an Asgardian tower on Stark Tower Watchtower once stood Heroic Age Main article Heroic Age comics In Stark Resilient storyline Tony builds Bleeding Edge armor with help Mister Fantastic This new armor fully uses repulsor tech battery embedded in his chest power Tony s entire body mind thus allowing him access Extremis once more Furthermore battery operates as his heart only thing keeping him alive Tony announces he will form new company Stark Resilient He states that he will no longer develop weapons but will use his repulsor technology give free energy world Justine Sasha Hammer create own armored hero Detroit Steel take Stark s place as Army s leading weapons builder Stark s plan consists building two repulsor powered cars Hammers try foil his efforts first car destroyed by sabotage while Detroit Steel attacks Stark Resilient s facilities while Tony tests second car Through legal maneuver Tony able get Hammers stop attacks releases successful commercial about his new car Fear Itself In Fear Itself storyline Earth attacked by Serpent God Fear long forgotten brother Odin In Paris Iron Man fights Grey Gargoyle has become Mokk Breaker Faith one Serpent s Worthy Mokk leaves Iron Man unconscious transforms Detroit Steel citizens Paris into stone defeat Serpent s army Tony drinks bottle wine thus sacrificing his sobriety gain an audience with Odin allows Tony enter realm Svartalfheim Tony dwarves Svartalfheim build enchanted weapons Tony upgrades his armor with uru infused enchantments delivers finished weapons Avengers use them final battle against Serpent s forces Iron Man watches as Thor kills Serpent but dies in process After battle over Tony melts down weapons he created repairs Captain America s shield which had been broken by Serpent gives it back Captain America During subsequent argument with Odin about gods lack involvement in recent crisis Odin gives Tony brief opportunity see vastness universe way he sees it As thanks Tony s role in recent crisis Odin restores all people that Grey Gargoyle killed during his rampage Return Mandarin Marvel NOW In storylines Demon Long Way Down Stark subpoenaed by U S government after evidence surfaces him using Iron Man armor while under influence Mandarin Zeke Stane upgrade some Iron Man s old enemies send them commit acts terrorism across world intending discredit Iron Man General Bruce Babbage forces Stark wear tech governor device that allows Babbage deactivate Stark s armor whenever he wants fight back Tony undergoes surgical procedure that expels Bleeding Edge technology out his body replaces his repulsor node with new model forcing Babbage remove tech governor off his chest He announces his retirement as Iron Man faking Rhodes death giving him new armor so that he becomes new Iron Man This leads into next storyline Future in which Mandarin takes control Stark s mind uses him create new armored bodies alien spirits inhabiting his rings but Stark allies himself with some his old enemies have also been imprisoned by Mandarin manages defeat him final issue this storyline concluded Matt Fraction s series In ongoing series that premiered in as part Marvel NOW relaunch Tony Stark has hit technological ceiling After death Dr Maya Hansen destruction all Extremis Version kits that were being sold black market Tony decides that Earth not safe without him learning more from s in final frontier He takes his new suit enhanced with an artificial intelligence named P E P P E R joins Peter Quill Guardians Galaxy after helping them thwart Badoon attack on Earth Superior Iron Man Tony Stark s personality inverted during events AXIS bringing out more dark aspects himself like irresponsibility egotism alcoholism Stark relocates San Francisco builds new all white armor He supplies citizens San Francisco with Extremis app version techno virus that offers beauty health even immortality free every person in city viewed Iron Man as messiah making dreams come true he ended free trial mode started charging daily fee causing many resort crime pay upgrade Daredevil confronts Stark at his new Alcatraz Island penthouse but easily brushed off Iron Man uses Extremis temporarily restore Daredevil s sight just prove his point Daredevil deduces that Stark had added Extremis water supply phones only transmit an activation signal but Stark subjects Murdock minor brain damage prevent him from sharing this revelation with others After discovering that new villain Teen Abomination son Happy Hogan Stark decides help him but this minor act redemption late Pepper Potts attacks Stark with aid an based on Stark s mind This culminates in confrontation between two Starks as Stark calls on unwitting aid all infected with Extremis upgrade while uses Stark s various old armors attack him Although Stark technically wins battle as he destroys his other armors deletes backup Pepper states that she plans reveal truth about his goals with Extremis bluntly informing him that if he continues his Extremis upgrade project he will have do it alone accepting his fate being regarded as monster by all know him Time Runs Out During Time Runs Out storyline an attempt at reclaiming Wakanda from Cabal that Namor had created destroy incursive Earths results in Tony being held captive in Necropolis After Cabal are apparently killed Illuminati free Tony forced flee due Illuminati s unwillingness let Stark be with them they meet Rogers Avengers Shi ar allies arrive destroy Earth Avengers Illuminati unsuccessfully try retaliate Iron Man uses Sol s Hammer destroy fleet incursions continue Rogers confronts Stark about he knows fight ensues between them Stark admits that he had lied had known about incursions all along During final incursion Earth s S H E L D launches full scale attack on Earth during which Stark Rogers are crushed by Helicarrier All New All Different Marvel After events Secret Wars crossover Stark returns his normal self with no signs his inverted personality Eight months following return universe as seen in All New All Different Marvel event Tony works in his laboratory non stop after his position as an innovator had been put in doubt an M T student reverse engineered some his technology Stark develops new armor which can change shape according situation he would find himself Stark s new Friday informs him that Madame Masque has broken into ruins Castle Doom he travels Latveria investigate runs into some revolutionaries are then defeated by man in suit his amazement Iron Man s armor computer identifies him as Doctor Doom with his face restored Doctor Doom claims that he wanted help Iron Man After learning from Doctor Doom that Madame Masque has taken decoy Wand Watoomb Tony Stark confronts Madame Masque Upon learning that Madame Masque not allied with Doctor Doom Tony attacked by her with burst energy that damages his armor Friday manages gain control suit takes Tony safe location Iron Man tracks Madame Masque Marina del Rey After finding tape recorder with her messages Tony attacked by several black silhouettes with swords Iron Man escapes ninjas that are attacking him manages defeat most them but they kill themselves before he can interrogate any them Iron Man Doctor Doom arrive at Mary Jane Watson s newest Chicago night club Jackpot Madame Masque attacks it As Mary Jane distracts Madame Masque by knocking off her mask Iron Man Doctor Doom discover that Madame Masque possessed by demon Doctor Doom able perform an exorcism on her volume issue needed Doctor Strange arrives tells Iron Man he will take Madame Masque with him fix her metaphysically then hand her over at S H E L D Iron Man also informs him Doctor Doom s help had left scene some time ago Three days later Iron Man offers Mary Jane job make up damage her nightclub After speaking with War Machine Tony Stark meets up at diner with Amara Perera they are unexpectedly joined by Doctor Doom wanted make sure that demonic possession that affected Madame Masque has not affected Stark Amara Stark shows Mary Jane demonstration on people that he will be working with They are interrupted by Friday tells Tony that War Machine missing volume issue needed Before heading Tokyo Tony receives from Mary Jane emergency number Peter Parker In Tokyo Iron Man contacted by Spider Man at War Machine s last known location as he being observed by ninjas During Civil War II storyline Iron Man protests logic using precognitive powers stop future crimes after recently emerged Inhuman Ulysses predicted Thanos s attack on Project Pegasus Three weeks later Iron Man summoned Triskelion after War Machine killed in battle against Thanos Iron Man learns that War Machine Ultimates used Ulysses power ambush Thanos he vows stop anyone from using that power again Iron Man infiltrates New Attilan makes off with Ulysses At Stark Tower Iron Man vows find out Ulysses precognition works Inhumans attack Stark Tower but are stopped by Avengers Ultimates S H E L D During confrontation Ulysses has another vision which he projects Iron Man everyone present showing rampaging Hulk standing over corpses defeated superheroes heroes confront Banner killed by Hawkeye Barton claims that Banner was about transform Banner had previously asked Hawkeye kill him if he should turn back into Hulk Tony disgusted at this use Ulysses power his analysis Ulysses brain completed Tony reveals that Ulysses does not actually see future but simply assembles large quantities data project likely outcomes While Danvers continues use visions as resource Tony objects concept profiling people This results in stand off Tony s side abducts woman from custody after Ulysses visions identified her as deep cover HYDRA agent despite lack supporting evidence Iron Man learns that his biological mother was actually Amanda Armstrong had given him up adoption that his biological father was Hydra double agent named Jude S H E L D had Armstrong s baby adopted by Howard Maria Stark Marvel NOW In July it was announced that Tony Stark would hand off mantle Iron Man year old girl named Riri Williams Riri an MIT student built her own Iron Man suit out scrap pieces as such attracted Stark s attention Early depictions Williams suit depict it without Arc Reactor but leaves power source suit unclear Another Iron Man based series titled Infamous Iron Man debuted featuring Doctor Doom sporting his version Iron Man armor This revealed be result serious injuries sustained by Stark during his final confrontation with Captain Marvel Danvers beating leaves Stark in coma but he left alive due unspecified experiments Stark has carried out on himself over years Existing as an Following revelation that Stark experimented on himself at end Civil War II Beast concludes that only option let experiments do job in healing Tony recover on his own volume issue needed In Invincible Iron Man an employee Stark sends Riri Williams an artificial intelligence housing copy Tony Stark s consciousness help her control mentor in her own version Iron Man armor This directly copied from Tony s brain granting sentience with Williams commenting on Stark existing as techno ghost As an Stark can walk around as hard light object gains ability remote control his vast armory Iron Man suits volume issue needed In Mighty Captain Marvel Tony Stark goes Antarctica visits Captain Marvel with intent on settling differences from Second Civil War she apologizes him her regrets reconciles with him eventually they become allies once more Then in Secret Empire Tony Stark suits up as Iron Man once again learns Captain America s betrayal Hydra he ended up like this As Hydra tightens its grip across America Tony Stark leads team known as Underground find Cosmic Cubes restore Rogers his normal self things start escalate Tony his crew go rogue in search answers Cube As Iron Man Underground search them they are intercepted by Captain America his Hydra team With both teams encountering each other they are captured by Ultron Hank Pym hybrid forces both teams sit at dinner table During dinner Ultron reveals information about Hydra Avengers such as Odinson working with Hydra reclaim Mjolnir Scarlet Witch being possessed by Chthon Vision being affected by an virus Ultron argues that he doing this Avengers have become less family over years as so many them jump obey Captain America Iron Man despite past experience confirming that this not always good idea but Tony counters that only reason team failed as family was Hank s abuse towards Wasp Enraged Ultron about kill everyone but Ant Man able calm him down by arguing that Hank remains his own inspiration Ultron allows Underground leave with fragment arguing that neither side should have an advantage over other Back in America Hydra Supreme has put Namor in position he will be forced sign peace treaty that gives Rogers access Cosmic Cube fragment in Atlantis but Hydra Supreme muses that he unconcerned about will acquire fragments as he has an inside man in Underground After Mount was attacked by Thor resurrected Hulk led by Hydra Underground evacuated civilians thanks Hawkeye rest heroes Captain America Iron Man fight as Mount collapses around them Tony Stark initiates Mount s Clean Slate Protocol blows up Mount killing Madame Hydra then apologizes Steve Rogers about past differences but survives in aftermath helps heroes pull pieces back together take down Hydra Iron Man confronts Hydra Supreme he other heroes are easily overpowered by him watch original Captain America defeat his Hydra self into celebrating victory Marvel Legacy This section needs be updated Please update this article reflect recent events newly available information May Mary Jane Watson other Stark employees find that Stark s body has completely vanished from its pod despite tests taken mere hours ago showing no sign improvement brain activity volume issue needed It was discovered that Tony Stark s comatose body was taken Stark Industries Complex in Dover Upon awakening his biological systems rebooted Tony Stark went into hiding until he fully recovered Wanting make sure that James Rhodes was in similar state that he was in Tony Stark exhumed his body from Arlington Cemetery kick started biological systems in him Afterwards Iron Man War Machine fought Hood keep Stark Industries from falling into Hood s hands he switched version his Extremis armor Then he proceeded defeat Jude he turned up alive Powers abilities equipment Armor Main article Iron Man s armor Bleeding Edge Armor like Extremis Armor before it stored in Stark s bones can be assembled controlled by his thoughts Iron Man possesses powered armor that gives him superhuman strength durability flight an array weapons armor invented worn by Stark with occasional short term exceptions Other people have assumed Iron Man identity include Stark s long time partner best friend James Rhodes close associates Harold Happy Hogan Eddie March briefly Michael O Brien Riri Williams weapons systems suit have changed over years but Iron Man s standard offensive weapons have always been repulsor rays that are fired from palms his gauntlets Other weapons built into various incarnations armor include uni beam projector in its chest pulse bolts that pick up kinetic energy along way so farther they travel harder they hit an electromagnetic pulse generator defensive energy shield that can be extended up degrees Other capabilities include generating ultra freon i e freeze beam creating manipulating magnetic fields emitting sonic blasts projecting dimensional holograms create decoys In addition general purpose model he wears Stark has developed several specialized suits space travel deep sea diving stealth other special purposes Stark has modified suits like Hulkbuster heavy armor Hulkbuster armor composed add ons his so called modular armor designed enhance its strength durability enough engage Hulk in fight later model created with help Odin Asgardian metal Uru similar Destroyer Stark develops an electronics pack during Armor Wars that attached armors that use Stark technologies will burn out those components rendering suit useless This pack ineffective on later models While it typically associated with James Rhodes War Machine armor began as one Stark s specialty armors most recent models Stark s armor beginning with Extremis armor are now stored in hollow portions Stark s bones personal area networking implement used control it implanted into his forearm connected directly his central nervous system Extremis has since been removed volume issue needed he now uses more conventional armors Some armors still take liquid form but are not stored within his body His Endo Sym Armor incorporates combination liquid smart metal with alien Venom symbiote psionically controlled by Stark Post Secret Wars Stark uses more streamlined suit armor that uses nanotechnology shape shift into other armors weapons Powers After being critically injured during battle with Extremis enhanced Mallen Stark injects his nervous system with modified techno organic virus like body restructuring machines Extremis process By rewriting his own biology Stark able save his life gain an enhanced healing factor partially merge with Iron Man armor superseding need bulky AI controlled armors in favor lighter designs technopathically controlled by his own brain His enhanced technopathy extends every piece technology limitless effortlessly due his ability interface with communication satellites wireless connections increase his range Some components armor sheath are now stored in Tony s body able be recalled extruded from his own skin at will During Secret Invasion storyline Extremis package catastrophically shut down by virus forcing him again rely on previous iteration his armor restoring his previous limitations Furthermore Osborn s takeover most few remaining Starktech factories with Ezekiel Stane systematically crippling others limits Tony use lesser older weaker armors After being forced wipe out his brain prevent Norman Osborn from gaining his information Tony Stark forced have new arc reactor Rand design installed in his chest process greatly improves his strength stamina intellect procedure left him with virtually no autonomic functions as his brain was stripped every biological function Tony forced rely on digital backup his memories leaving him with severe gaps lapses in his long term memory on software routine in arc reactor basic stimuli reaction such as blinking breathing Bleeding Edge package armor physical enhancement now equal in power if not more advanced version old Extremis tech Skills Tony Stark an inventive genius whose expertise in fields mathematics physics chemistry computer science rivals that Reed Richards Hank Pym Bruce Banner his expertise in electrical engineering mechanical engineering surpasses even theirs He regarded as one most intelligent characters in Marvel Universe He graduated with advanced degrees in physics engineering at age from Massachusetts Institute Technology MIT further developed his knowledge ranging from artificial intelligence quantum mechanics as time progressed His expertise extends his ingenuity in dealing with difficult situations such as difficult foes deathtraps in which he capable using available tools including his suit in unorthodox but effective ways He well respected in business world able command people s attention he speaks on economic matters having over years built up several multimillion dollar companies from virtually nothing He noted loyalty he commands from returns those work him as well as his business ethics Thus he immediately fired an employee made profitable but illegal sales Doctor Doom He strives be environmentally responsible in his businesses At time Stark was unable use his armor period he received some combat training from Captain America has become physically formidable on his own situation demands it In addition Stark possesses great business political acumen On multiple occasions he reacquired control his companies after losing them amid corporate takeovers Due his membership in Illuminati Iron Man was given Space Infinity Gem safeguard It allows user exist in any location all locations move any object anywhere throughout universe warp rearrange space Supporting characters Main article List Iron Man supporting characters Other versions Main article Alternative versions Iron Man In other media Main article Iron Man in other media See also Tony Stark Marvel Cinematic Universe Robert Downey Jr as Tony Stark as depicted in film Iron Man In Iron Man was featured in series cartoons In Iron Man guest appeared in Spider Man His Amazing Friends but only as Tony Stark He went on feature again in his own series in s as part Marvel Action Hour with Fantastic Four Robert Hays provided his voice in these animated cartoons Iron Man makes an appearance in episode Shell Games Fantastic Four World s Greatest Heroes Apart from comic books Iron Man appears in Capcom s Vs video games including Marvel Super Heroes Marvel vs Capcom New Age Heroes Marvel vs Capcom Fate Two Worlds Ultimate Marvel vs Capcom Iron Man playable character in Iron Man arcade game Captain America Avengers Marvel Ultimate Alliance its sequel Marvel Nemesis Rise Imperfects as well as being featured as an unlockable character in X Men Legends II Rise Apocalypse Tony Hawk s Underground In animated series Iron Man Armored Adventures most characters including Tony Stark are teenagers An anime adaptation began airing in Japan in October as part collaboration between Marvel Animation Madhouse in which Stark voiced by Keiji Fujiwara travels Japan he ends up facing off against Zodiac Iron Man suit Mark VI from Iron Man premiered in In film adaptation titled Iron Man was released starring Robert Downey Jr as Tony Stark directed by Jon Favreau Iron Man received very positive reviews from film critics grossing million domestically million worldwide became first in series over films known as Marvel Cinematic Universe character Tony Stark again played by Robert Downey Jr appeared at end film Incredible Hulk Downey reprised his role in Iron Man Marvel s Avengers Iron Man Avengers Age Ultron Captain America Civil War Spider Man Homecoming Avengers Infinity War Avengers Endgame upcoming Black Widow In Playtech released an online casino slot machine game called Iron Man After that they created two more games Iron Man Iron Man In October Eoin Colfer released young adult novel called Iron Man Gauntlet Cultural influence legacy Basically m here announce that we are building Iron Man th President United States Barack Obama made surprise announcement at press conference at White House he revealed details creation Manufacturing Innovation Institutes in Chicago Detroit rapper Ghostface Killah member Wu Tang Clan titled his debut solo album Ironman has since continued use lyrics related Iron Man comics samples from animated TV shows on his records He has adopted nickname Tony Starks as one his numerous alter egos was featured in scene deleted from Iron Man film Paul McCartney s song Magneto Titanium Man was inspired by X Men s nemesis original version Iron Man villain Another Iron Man villain Crimson Dynamo mentioned in lyrics this song British band Razorlight mentions Tony Stark in verse song Hang By Hang By character Nathan Stark on television show Eureka inspired by Tony Stark In IGN ranked Iron Man th in Top Comic Book Heroes Two Iron Man themed trucks compete in Monster Jam monster truck racing series Debuted in Atlanta on January they are driven by Lee O Donnell Morgan Kane In University Central Florida engineering student Albert Manero builds donates affordable D printed bionic limbs those in need constructed bionic arm based on Iron Man s suit year old Alex Pring superhero fan was born with partially formed right arm He then delivered Iron Man arm Pring with help Robert Downey Jr in character as Tony Stark Major League Baseball Players Weekend in August New York Yankees second baseman Gleyber Torres designed his custom cleats after Iron Man s suit TV show demonstrated hovering bullet mitigating suit with some official Marvel design features
